title: Black List Holiday Happy Hour!
desc: It?s our last happy hour of 2015 so let?s go out in style! Join the Black List team and your fellow screenwriters on? Wednesday, December 9th ?to kick off the holiday season. To get into the spirit (and the door), we?re asking that everyone bring a new toy to gift to a local kid via the wonderful? Toys for Tots . Everyone who brings a gift will receive one free month of hosting on the Black List. Wednesday, December 9 at Melrose Umbrella Co. Starting at 6pm The event is free and open to the public,? so share the joy and tell all your writer friends. We'll see you all there!
